data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,953 believers in Moyen-Ogooué against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Wolof people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Wolof people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Wolof people is yours.
Father, let the threatened of Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Moyen-Ogooué, Gabon.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Moyen-Ogooué
location.people_groups_list: Simba, Eviya, Bandoumu, Minduumo, Okande, Kande, Teke, Northern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Simba (200), Eviya (500), Bandoumu, Minduumo (5,500), Okande, Kande (900), Teke, Northern (156,000)
